name: mapreduce.task.timeout
description:
The number of milliseconds before a task will be
  terminated if it neither reads an input, writes an output, nor
  updates its status string.  A value of 0 disables the timeout.

name: dfs.namenode.snapshot.max.limit
description:
Limits the maximum number of snapshots allowed per snapshottable
    directory.If the configuration is not set, the default limit
    for maximum no of snapshots allowed is 65536.

name: dfs.balancer.getBlocks.size
description:
Total size in bytes of Datanode blocks to get when fetching a source's
    block list.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.read.timeout
description:
Expert: The maximum amount of time (in milli seconds) reduce
  task waits for map output data to be available for reading after obtaining
  connection.

name: dfs.block.invalidate.limit
description:
The maximum number of invalidate blocks sent by namenode to a datanode
    per heartbeat deletion command. This property works with
    "dfs.namenode.invalidate.work.pct.per.iteration" to throttle block
    deletions.

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.retry-after-no-speculate
description:
The waiting time(ms) to do next round of speculation
  if there is no task speculated in this round.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.idle.sleep.ms
description: The sleep time of DeadNodeDetector per iteration.
